Package com.fortify.pub.bugtracker.support

Support classes required for operation of the bug tracker plugins
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserAuthenticationStore
    An interface that returns the username and password that the user provided in clear text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bug
    Value object that represents a bug that has been logged in an external bug tracking system
    BugParam
    A value object that represents a bug parameter that user needs to supply a value for at the time of filing the bug.
    BugParamChoice
    A bug parameter that translates to a drop down on the View layer
    BugParamText
    A free-form bug parameter that translates to a text box in the view layer
    BugParamTextArea
    A free-form bug parameter that translates to a text area in the view layer
    BugSubmission
    All of the information about the bug that gets included during submission An object of this type is supplied to the plugin while filing a bug
    BugTrackerConfig
    Value object representing a configuration setting required by a Bug Tracker Plugin.
    BugTrackerPluginConstants
    Constants to be used within Bug Tracker plugins.
    IssueComment
    Issue comments get included with the bug submission object while filing a bug.
    IssueDetail  
    MultiIssueBugSubmission
    All of the information about the bug that gets included during submission An object of this type is supplied to the plugin while filing a bug
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BugTrackerAuthenticationException
    Throw this exception for authentication failures possibly due to invalid bug tracker username or password.
    BugTrackerException
    Throw this exception for failures caused due to user input error.
